scripts:
set ACL for wholesale-authors
allow jcr:read,rep:write,jcr:versionManagement,jcr:lockManagement on /content/wholesale,/content/experience-fragments/wholesale
end

set ACL for wholesale-admins
allow crx:replicate,jcr:readAccessControl on /content/wholesale,/content/dam/wholesale,/content/experience-fragments/wholesale,/conf/wholesale
end

set ACL for wholesale-observers
allow jcr:read on /content/wholesale,/content/dam/wholesale
end
create user test-wholesale-author with password Wholesa*e123
create user test-wholesale-admin with password Wholesa*e123
